script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
八咫鏡と一緒に
教会にやってきた

# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_0003"
;; face %(unit_a)s "close"
# textflame 1 1
@八咫鏡
ふむ…
よい空気じゃな
実に清浄である

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# textflame 1 1
@八咫鏡
ここを訪れれば…
神に関心がないものでも
懐を正さずにはおれんじゃろ

# select "神様を信じる？" "select_label_01" "神様ってどんなもの？" "select_label_02" "神様はいないかも" "select_label_03"
ここを訪れれば…
神に関心がないものでも
懐を正さずにはおれんじゃろ

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
